name: Personalised Christmas Canvas Gift
description:
Like us on facebook: www.facebook.com/ellaandjoe

A unique personalised Christmas canvas gift, decoration or keepsake for children.
 
These Christmas canvases are for babies or young children. They can be hung on the wall, or can be stood on the fireplace, a bookshelf, chest of drawers, window sill or wherever you fancy!
 
They can be brought out every Christmas as a decoration and a keepsake.
 
The canvases are hand painted either red or green and they have a selction of wooden charms: hearts, stars, trees and a painted wooden buttons.
Please select which colour you prefer.
 
The canvases are finished with ribbon and a hand-tied bow.
 
The canvases are personalised at the base with the child's first name in white foam letters.
 
At the centre of the canvas is either a wooden heart or star which has the child's first and second names on along with their date of birth or the Christmas year.
 
The text could read "Ella's 1st Christmas 2013" or it could read "Happy Christmas George 2013" or it could just read the child's 1st and 2nd name followed by the date - or you could choose different wording which is personal to you.

We will contact you afterwards to find out whether you would prefer a heart or a star shape and also to find out the name and the words you'd like in the heart or star shape.

Wooden frame, Cotton canvas, Wooden charms, Polyester and cotton mix gingham ribbon bow

17.5 x 12.5 x 4cm

name: Personalised Christmas Stocking
description:
Cute handmade Christmas stockings for children.
 
These Christmas stockings are a unique modern take on the more traditional styles. Each stocking is padded to ensure it is strong, yet soft to hold all those presents!
 
The stockings can be personalised with a name. We can try to fit on any name, so even if you feel the name is too long, just ask and we'll try our hardest to do it.
 
The letters used are all individual and are in different prints. They are blanket stitched around the edges.
 
Above each name are two different wooden beads.
 
The stockings have a loop of dotty grosgrain ribbon at the top, so they can hung on a door handle, the end of a bed, on a Christmas tree or wherever you prefer!
 
You can choose from the pink and white gingham check stocking with pink dotty ribbon loop or the green and white gingham check stocking with the red dotty ribbon loop.
We will contact you afterwards to find out what colour stocking you require.

The price is for a 6 letter name - if the name you require is longer, then each additional letter is and extra Â£1. Please select from the drop down menu for the number of letters you require.
We will contact you afterwards to confirm what name you'd like on the stocking.

Made from:

65% cotton 35% polyester gingham fabric, 100% polyester padding, 100% acrylic felt.
 
Handmade in the UK.
 
Not washable.

41.5 x 24.5cm (at widest points).

name: Set Of Eight Shabby Chic Canvases
description:
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/ellaandjoe

This is a set of 8 shabby chic canvases with various heart and bird metal trims and all feature lace and ribbon details.

This set of 8 canvases is a unique pretty gift to give to a close friend or family member for any occasion or just for yourself. You can also personalise each canvas with a word or name.
We will contact you afterwards to find out which names or words you'd like on the canvases.

The wooden frames are deep at approximately 3.7cm so the canvas pictures can either be hung on a wall or they are equally happy standing. They can be stood on a window sill or on a dressing table or fireplace.

Each canvas can be personalised with words of your choice. You can choose a word such as believe, love, laugh. live etc or you could choose to have a name on it such as Ella, Olivia, Ruby, Mum, Nana etc or choose Thank you or Good Luck for example.

If you have words which you feel are too long to fit on this - please just ask and we'll try our hardest to fit it on for you.

You can change the colour of the canvases if you wish to make the canvas to tie in with any room and colour scheme, so it will co-ordinate perfectly in its new home. We will contact you to discuss which colour(s) you'd like. We use 'Dulux' matt paint, so we can achieve any colour you desire and indeed achieve a perfect match to your walls.

Each of these 8 canvases are also available to buy individually, please have a look at our full range to see all details of buying individually.

Dimensions:
Clockwise from the top pink canvas - the dimensions are:

1. Pink 'Love' canvas - 20 x 15 x 3.7cm

2. Light grey bird canvas - 7.5 x 10 x 3.7cm

3. Mid grey metal heart canvas - 12.5 x 12.5 x 3.7cm

4. Sage green with pink vintage heart canvas - 10 x 7.5 x 3.7cm

5. White pink beaded heart canvas - 25 x 20 x 3.7cm

6. Black silver metal heart canvas - 15 x 15 x 3.7cm

7. Pale coral with turquoise vintage heart canvas - 10 x 7.5 x 3.7cm

8. Light grey with cream daisy heart canvas - 12.5 x 12.5 x 3.7cm

name: Shabby Chic Silver Heart Canvas
description:
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/ellaandjoe

A shabby chic canvas with a silver metal heart and lace design and word of your choice.
 
This black colour canvas is a unique pretty gift to give to a close friend or family member for any occasion and you can personalise it with one word or name if you wish.
 
The wooden frame is deep at approximately 3.7cm so the canvas picture can either be hung on a wall or it is equally happy standing. It could be stood on a window sill or on a dressing table or fireplace.
 
The metal heart is painted in a silver colour and the lace is an ivory cotton with a slotted ribbon threaded through.
 
This product can be personalised with one word of your choice. You can choose a word such as hope, love, laugh. live, thank you etc or you could choose to have a name on it such as Hope, Ella, Olivia, Ruby, Mum, Nana etc. See additional images to show examples of this effect.
 
If you have a word you feel is too long to fit on this - please just ask and we'll try our hardest to fit it on for you.
 
You can change the colour of the canvas if you wish to make the canvas to tie in with any room and colour scheme, so it will co-ordinate perfectly in its new home. Please select the 'your choice of canvas colour' option and we will contact you to discuss which colour you'd like. We use 'Dulux' matt paint, so we can achieve any colour you desire.

Wooden frame, 100% cotton canvas, metal heart, polyester lace.

15 x 15 x 3.7cm

name: The Hope 2 Friendship Canvas
description:
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/ellaandjoe

Proceeds from this canvas go to The Jessica Hope Foundation. For more details: www.facebook.com/thejessicahopefoundation

This canvas is a unique pretty gift to give to a close friend or family member for any occasion and you can personalise it with one word.

The wooden frame is deep at approximately 3.7cm so the canvas picture can either be hung on a wall or it is equally happy standing. It could be stood on a window sill or on a dressing table or fireplace.

The canvas is white and in the centre is a wire heart with the word 'love' across it. The heart has a selection of different pink and clear beads attached to it with a fine wire.

At the base of the canvas is a strip of ivory cotton lace with ribbon slotted through it.

This product can be personalised with one word of your choice. You can choose a word such as Hope (as pictured) or love, laugh, live etc or you could choose to have a name on it such as Hope (as pictured) or Ella, Olivia, Ruby, Mum, Nana etc.

Or you could have a small message such as 'thank you' or 'good luck'.

If you have a word you feel is too long to fit on this - please just ask and we'll try our hardest to fit it on for you.

You can also change the colour of the canvas if you wish to make the canvas to tie in with any room - so it will co-ordinate perfectly in its new home. Please contact us to discuss.

Dimensions:
15 x 20 x 3.7cm, approx 200g

name: Personalised Dad Canvas Gift
description:
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/ellaandjoe

A cute canvas personalised for Dad or Grandad for Father's Day, Birthday, Anniversary, Christmas or for any special occasion.

This canvas is a unique personalised gift to give to either Dad or Grandad.

The wooden frame is deep at approximately 3.7cm so the canvas picture can either be hung on a wall or it is equally happy standing. It could be stood on a desk, a window sill or fireplace.

You can have a photo in the centre of the canvas which is mounted on a 3mm deep wooden heart. The photo can either be colour or black & white. You will need to email us the photo you wish to have in the middle of the canvas, we will contact you after you have placed your order to arrange this.

The photo is then 'framed' with a whicker heart to give it a natural feel and a small wooden star is place by the words.

This product can be personalised with your own words. The letters are hand-stamped onto a natural mount card and then placed on the canvas. We would suggest using a small amount of words as the images suggest and to include the name of the receiver of the gift: Dad, Grandad, Grandpa, Pops, Papa..... any name and any spelling is fine because they are made to order.

If you have anything tricky or you feel too long to fit on this - please just ask and we'll try our hardest to fit it on for you.

The canvas is hand painted in a either pale grey or black (as images suggest) - but if you'd prefer another colour, just ask and we'll be happy to customise it to your colour choice so it will co-ordinate perfectly in its new home.

These are made to order, so it is possible to make changes and amends to suit you.

Dimensions:
20 x 20 x 3.7cm

name: Wedding Guest Book Canvas
description:
Like us on www.facebook.com/ellaandjoe

A truly unique hand made personalised canvas for your guests to sign at your wedding.

This very large canvas is a unique take on the traditional wedding guest book.

The canvas is personalised with your names and date of your wedding day. There are 2 rows of satin ribbon rose buds in a heart shape around the words.

The rest of the canvas is blank for your guests to sign with their special words and well wishes.

The canvas come with 2 permanent black pens suitable for writing on this surface.

After your wedding you have a piece of art to hang in your home to remember your special day forever.

The words on the canvas are personalised for you to show the bride and grooms name and the date of the wedding.

You can choose up to 2 colours for the 2 rows of the satin ribbon roses in the heart shape - as the images show the roses are a bright pink and a bright blue, but you can also just choose 1 colour if you prefer and we will make it with 2 rows of roses in the same colour - you can choose from the following rose colours:

1. Deep Mulberry. 2. Bright Pink. 3. Red. 4. Bright Blue. 5. Aqua Blue. 6. Mauve Purple. 7. Dusky Peach. 8. Pale Pink. 9. Lilac. 10. Black. 11. All White. 12, Cream. 13. White with green leaves (not pictured).

If you require different colour rose buds than the ones listed above - just ask and we'll do our best to get them from you.

There are stripes around the edges of the canvas - these will be the same colours you have chosen for the rose buds to co-ordinate. However if you prefer to not have the stripes around the edge we can remove these.

We will send you by email a proof of the artwork in your chosen colours to approve before we print the canvas - you can make amends and / or tweak colours at this stage to ensure you are completely happy with your order before we make it.

Easel not included.

Dimensions:
90 x 90 x 4cm, approx 2000g.

name: Personalised Friendship Canvas Gift
description:
Like us on www.facebook.com/ellaandjoe 

A gorgeous personalised canvas with ribbon rose-buds creating a heart or circle shape around your chosen words.

This canvas is a unique personalised gift to give to a close friend or family member. It also makes a perfect mother's day gift for mums or grandmas.

The wooden frame is deep at approximately 4cm so the canvas picture can either be hung on a wall or it is equally happy standing. It could be stood on a window sill or on a dressing table or fireplace.

The canvas is hand painted in a colour or your choice and the heart or circle shape is outlined in your choice of colour of satin ribbon rose-buds.

Inside either the heart or circle shape is your text â you can have any words you desire.

This product can be personalised with your own words. The end font used is usually in font size 6 - so I would recommend maximum 1 1/2 lines of text as on an A4 sheet - this creates a good flow of the words once they are repeated.

If you have a poem - this can also be done but the words will not be repeated to the edge of the heart or circle shape - instead the poem will just read once as it is.

You can also choose the colour of canvas and the colour of the ribbon rose-buds - you can tailor make the canvas to tie in with any room - so it will co-ordinate perfectly in its new home.

Just contact us to discuss any specific requirements.

You can choose your colour of ribbon rose-bud flowers from the options when you place your order.

After we have received your order we will contact you find out what colour you would like the canvas painted AND whether you would like a heart shape or a circle shape.

Dimensions:
12.5 x 12.5 x 4cm.

name: Personalised Wedding Heart Favour Canvas
description:
Like us on www.facebook.com/ellaandjoe

Discounts available for large quantities - just contact us to discuss.

These are hand-made personalised wedding favour canvases ideal for your wedding table and as a keepsake for you and your guests.

These mini canvas favours are perfect for placing at each guestâs place setting at the wedding breakfast, they can be stood up, or could also be propped against the napkin, or wine glass for example.

They are all hand-made to order and are truly unique. You can choose your own words, and if you like, tweak the colours to suit your special day.

All over the canvas in the background, you can have any words you desire. Your words are then repeated as the image suggests at a suitable size and placed over the canvas and the edges.

You can choose your colour of beaded heart. You can choose from the following beaded heart colours: white, black, gold, silver, vintage pink, bright pink, purple, bright blue or red.

Inside each of the coloured beaded heart there is a silver wire heart with pearl effect beads.

If you have a specific colour for your wedding day which is not listed then please just ask and we will try to find it for you.

In terms of delivery, it would be much appreciated if you could order in good time, especially if you are ordering a large number. Generally we would like at least 14 days to make your order, but if you require them urgently, then please contact us and we will see what we can do.

There is no minimum order quantity.

You can also choose to have each mini canvas in an organza bag - please enquire about this and we can send you an image before you decide whether you would like this. The organza bags are an additional Â£0.25 each per bag.

Dimensions:
7 x 7 x 1cm.

name: Personalised Wedding Heart Place Setting
description:
Like us on www.facebook.com/ellaandjoe

Discounts available for large quantities - just contact us to discuss.

Personalised handmade wedding name place settings on mini canvases with a beaded heart colour of your choice and either black or white lace.

These name place settings are perfect for placing at each guestâs place setting at the wedding breakfast to show the guest where they will be sitting. They can be stood up, or could also be propped against the napkin, or wine glass for example.

They are handmade and you can truly personalise them with your own special words. They can not only be used on the special day but also as a fabulous keepsake for each guest.

Each mini canvas is white and you can choose your colour of beaded heart to frame the words. You can choose from the following beaded heart colours: white, black, gold, silver, vintage pink, bright pink, purple, bright blue or red.

If you have a specific colour for your wedding day which is not listed then please just ask and we will try to find it for you.

There is a piece of lace down the left hand side of the mini canvas - you can choose from white or black lace - or a mixture of the two. Maybe white for the ladies and black for the men?
We will contact you after you have placed your order to find out what colour lace you would like.

Inside either the heart shape is your text, we think three lines of text looks best. You will need to have your guestâs name which we will do in a bolder text, plus a row of text above and below this. 

We will require a list of all your guestâs names â we'll contact you separately to request this.

In terms of delivery, it would be much appreciated if you could order in good time, especially if you are ordering a large number. Generally we would like at least 14 days to make your order, but if you require them urgently, please contact us and we'll see what we can do.

You can also choose to have each mini canvas in an organza bag - please enquire about this and we can send you an image before you decide whether you would like this. The organza bags are an additional Â£0.25 each per bag.

Dimensions:
7 x 7 x 1cm.

name: Personalised Wedding Favour Canvases
description:
Like us on www.facebook.com/ellaandjoe

Discounts available for large quantities - just contact us to discuss.

These wedding favours are hand-made on mini canvases â each canvas measures just 7cm x 7cm and is 1cm deep.

Perfect for placing at each guestâs place setting at the wedding breakfast, they can be stood up, or could also be propped against the napkin, or wine glass for example.

Each mini canvas is hand painted white and you can choose from a heart shape or a circle shape which is outlined in tiny white satin ribbon rose-buds.

Inside either the heart or circle shape is your text â you can have any words you desire. Your words are then repeated as the image suggests at a suitable size and printed onto white Conqueror laid paper â this paper is textured and adds a little more luxury to the favour.

You can choose either the heart shape or the circle shape for your wedding favours, or you could also request a mixtureâ¦â¦maybe heart shapes for the ladies and circle shapes for the men? If you would like a mixture, then we will contact you find out quantities required for each shape.

If you have a particular colour theme to your wedding and would like this to be reflected on the wedding favours, then please contact us. We can paint the canvas any colour and / or use different coloured ribbon rose buds to co-ordinate with your wedding.

These are made to order, so it is possible to make changes and amends to suit you.

Hand-made in Newcastle-upon-Tyne with love x

In terms of delivery, it would be much appreciated if you could order in good time, especially if you are ordering a large number. Generally we would like at least 14 days to make your order, but if you require them urgently, then please contact us and we will see what we can do.

There is no minimum order quantity.

Discounts available for large quantities - just contact us to discuss.

name: Personalised Bridesmaid Canvas Gift
description:
Like us on www.facebook.com/ellaandjoe

A gorgeous white hand-made canvas which can be personalised with your own special words.

This canvas is a unique personalised gift to give to your bridesmaid(s) on your special day to not only say thank you, but also as a keepsake.

The wooden frame is deep at approximately 4cm so the canvas picture can either be hung on a wall or it is equally happy standing. It could be stood on a window sill or on a dressing table or fireplace.

The canvas is hand painted white and the heart shape is outlined in white satin ribbon rose-buds.

This product can be personalised with your own words in a heart shape . The end font used is usually in font size 6 - so I would recommend maximum 1 1/2 lines of text as on an A4 sheet - this creates a good flow of the words once they are repeated.

If you have a poem - this can also be done but the words will not be repeated to the edge of the circle or heart shape - instead the peom will just read once as it is - see additional image of this.

if you have anything tricky or you feel too long to fit on this - please just ask and I'll try my hardest to fit it on for you.

Inside the heart shape is your text are your words which are then repeated as the main image suggests at a suitable size and printed onto white Conqueror laid textured 120gsm paper â this paper is textured and adds a little more luxury to the gift.

If you have a particular colour theme to your wedding and would like this to be reflected on the bridesmaid canvas gift, then please contact us. We can paint the canvas any colour and / or use different coloured ribbon rose buds to co-ordinate with your wedding.

Or, if you like this canvas, but would prefer it smaller or larger, please contact us to discuss.

These are made to order, so it is possible to make changes and amends to suit you.

Dimensions:
SMALL - 12.5 x 12.5 x 3.7cm (as pictured)
MEDIUM - 20 x 20 x 3.7cm

name: Personalised Love Canvas Keepsake
description:
Like us on www.facebook.com/ellaandjoe

Personalised handmade mini valentines canvas with a beaded heart and lace design.

Each canvas comes in it's own organza bag.

These mini valentines canvas gifts are a unique gift to give to your loved one and can be kept as a keepsake.

They are handmade and you can truly personalise them with your own special words.

They are beautifully finished and come in an organza bag so are perfect to give a special gift to that special person in your life.

Each mini canvas is hand painted either white or black.

The black canvas has a red beaded heart and a white lace effect design. It comes in a black organza bag.

The white canvas has a bright pink beaded heart and a black lace effect design. It comes in a white organza bag.

You can choose what text you would like on your canvas - just a few words are best because the canvas is small (7x7x1cm) - so choose something similar in length as the images suggest.

name: Personalised Baby Boy Canvas Picture
description:
Like us on www.facebook.com/ellaandjoe

A unique personalised canvas gift in blue for a baby boy..

This canvas is for a baby or young boy. It can be given as a new baby gift, christening or Birthday gift. It can be hung on the wall, or can be stood on a bookshelf, chest of drawers, window sill or wherever you fancy!

The canvas is hand painted blue. it has a selction of wooden charms: hearts, teddy bear, star and a blue car.

The canvas is finished with a hand tied blue and white gingham bow.

The canvas is personalised at the base with the baby boys first name in white foam letters.

At the centre of the canvas is a wooden heart which has the baby boys first and second names on along with their date of birth, but you can choose whichever text you want - you dont need to have the date if you just wanted to give the canvas as a 1st Birthday or Christening gift.


Dimensions:
17.5x12.5x4cm, approx 250g

name: Personalised Baby Girl Canvas Picture
description:
Like us on www.facebook.com/ellaandjoe

A unique personalised canvas gift in pink for a baby girl.

This canvas is for a baby or young girl. It can be given as a new baby gift, christening or Birthday gift. It can be hung on the wall, or can be stood on a bookshelf, chest of drawers, window sill or wherever you fancy!

The canvas is hand painted pink. it has a selction of wooden charms: hearts, teddy bear and a floral printed wooden button.

The canvas is finished with a hand tied pink and white gingham bow.

The canvas is personalised at the base with the baby girls first name in white foam letters.

At the centre of the canvas is a wooden heart which has the baby girls first and second names on along with their date of birth, but you can choose whichever text you want - you dont need to have the date if you just wanted to give the canvas as a 1st Birthday or Christening gift.

Dimensions:
17.5x12.5x4cm, approx 250g

name: Four Personalised Animal Canvases
description:
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/ellaandjoe

Personalised children's canvas pictures. Baby's personalised first Christmas gift. Christening personalised gift. Children's personalised birthday gift. New baby personalised gift.

These chunky canvas pictures come as a choice of four designs: white bunny rabbit, elephant, cat and bear screen prints at Â£25 each. Or you can buy the complete set of four for Â£85. If you want one particular design individually then look at the other products in my shop - they are all listed seperately.

Each animal face is beaded with clear, silver lined seed beads.

At the base of the children's personalised rabbit canvas picture are seven painted wooden bunny rabbit charms.

At the base of the children's personalised elephant canvas picture are eight plastic elephant charms.

At the base of the children's personalised cat canvas picture are nine wooden cat charms.

At the base of the children's personalised bear canvas picture are nine wooden bear charms.

Each personalised canvas picture is finished on the right hand side with a co-ordinating gingham hand tied bow.

If you would like, we can personalise the canvas with the child's name. We can add the first and the second names in white foam letters around the outline of the animal face - as the images suggest. This is at no extra cost to you if you would like it personalised.

Don't worry if you have a long name to add, if we have any difficulties, we will contact you and email you a photo of your chosen names mocked up - you can then decide if you are happy with it or not before you purchase it.

Each canvas comes in it's own polyester cotton mix fabric gingham bag. The bag is tied at the top with white satin ribbons and is finished with an 'Ella & Joe' woven label. Perfect to give as a gift. The bag is colour co-ordinated to each canvas colour.

These canvases make perfect gifts for babies and young children: girls or boys, either for a newborn baby gift, christening gift, Birthday or Christmas gift. Because the canvas can be personalised and it comes packaged in it's own co-ordinating fabric bag, it is a truely unqiue and distinctive gift.

Each individual canvas is 25cm x 25cm x 4cm deep.

Each canvas picture is individually made so there may be slight variations to the photo you are looking at.

name: Four Butterfly Canvases
description:
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/ellaandjoe

Girls canvas pictures. Girls bedroom accessories. Girls wall art. Girls Christmas gift. Girls Birthday gift.

This is a set of four canvas pictures.

Each individual canvas is 12.5cm x 12.5cm x 4cm. When the four canvases are hung in a grid together with 1cm inbetween them, the finished dimensions are 26cm x 26cm x 4cm.

Each canvas is hand-painted and then a felt butterfly in contrasting colours is positioned on the painted canvas. On top of the felt butterflies, a mesh appliqued and sequined butterfly is attached.

These canvases are perfect for younger or older girls, from toddlers up to age 10. They are perfect for a Birthday or Christmas gift, or if you are re-decorating and they would complement the child's bedroom.

Each canvas is handmade in Newcastle-upon-Tyne with love.

If you like the design of these canvases but would prefer a different colour scheme, they can be specially made for you with your requirements with mind and colours in mind. Please contact us and we can discuss this further with you.

Each canvas is individually made so there may be slight variations to the photo you are looking at.

name: Large Embellished Animal Canvas
description:
Children's canvas picture. Children's Christmas gift. Children's Birthday gift. Children's wall art. Children's bedroom accessories.

Large bright colour chunky canvas picture with multiple animal face screen print.

The bunny rabbit face is beaded with bright pink, silver lined seed beads. The elephant face is beaded with purple, silver lined seed beads. The cat face is beaded with green, silver lined seed beads. The bear face is beaded with yellow, silver lined seed beads.

In total there are 64 beaded animal faces on this canvas picture.

This canvas picture is large and would be suitable, striking addition for either a girl's or a boy's bedroom due to it's bright colour theme.

The canvas is 50cm x 50cm x 4cm deep.

Each canvas is individually made so there may be slight variations to the photo you are looking at.

name: Quilted Floral Reversible Throw And Cushions
description:
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/ellaandjoe

This is a bedding set suitable for young girls. It consists of a quilted throw and two cushions.

The quilted throw comes in 2 sizes - junior bed or single bed, so is suitable for girls from toddler age up to 10 years.

The quilted throw is reversible - on one side there is a white base pink floral printed design and the other side is a small pink and white woven gingham check. All the edges are trimmed with a white cotton crochet trim and finished with a woven "Ella & Joe" label.

Each quilted throw comes with two cushions, one is the white based pink floral print and the other is the pink and white woven gingham check. Both cushions are trimmed with the white cotton crochet trim to compliment the quilted throw.

The junior bed quilted throw is 120cm x 150cm.

The single bed quilted throw is 140cm x 200cm.

The cushions are 35cm x 35cm each. The cushion pads are included with the cushion covers and are washable.

Each item is machine washable at a 40 degrees machine wash and is 100% cotton.

name: Flower Quilted Throw With Cushions
description:
Like us on facebook www.facebook.com/ellaandjoe

A gorgeous quilted throw with two cushions bedding set.

This bedding set is suitable for girls who are in a junior bed or cot bed.

The front of the quilt is a mixture of appliqued animal faces: bunny rabbit, bear, cat and elephant at the base. Then above the appliqued area, the animal faces are embroidered. Inbetween the embroidery there are scattered gingham ribbon bows in pastel shades: pink, blue, green and yellow.

The flower print is in shades of pinks, yellow and green on a white background.

There are two cushions which accompany this quilted throw - the floral design has a cat applique on one of the cushions.

The cushion pads are included with the cushion covers and are washable.

Please note the floral print is as the image at the end - the print is a white base with a pinks, yellow and green floral design rather than the initial images which shows a white base with pink, red and green floral design.

100% Cotton.
Everything machine washable at 40 degrees.

QUILTED THROW 142 x 126 cm
CUSHIONS 35 x 35 cm
